subject: Your account with us
body:
Site change:
 
We have moved our site to a new domain due to high traffic
volume.
Our site still looks the same and we still offer the same
products.
 
Since you are an existing client we are offering you a 48%
discounts on our products.
This offer will last until the end of April, 2007.  
 
Please remember to use your custom link below in order to receive
your savings.
http://The00.cheedessleep.com
 

 
We hope you enjoy our new site, and if you have any
questions just use the contact form on our website.
 
Thanks
 
Michele Damon
Webmaster
CheedPharm Inc.
 
 
 




Site Change:
This is email has been sent as a reminder of our site change.
Our domain has been changed to http://cheedessleep.com.
Your custom link is: http://The00.cheedessleep.com
Sorry for the inconvenience
